summary: Paramount Pictures said Wednesday hit horror movie "A Quiet Place" was getting a sequel and ended mounting speculation over its lucrative "Star Trek" franchise by confirming two new movies.
title: 'A Quiet Place,' 'Star Trek' sequels announced
story:
A scene from 'A Quiet Place'


LAS VEGAS -- Paramount Pictures said Wednesday hit horror movie "A Quiet Place" was getting a sequel and ended mounting speculation over its lucrative "Star Trek" franchise by confirming two new movies. 
Chairman and CEO Jim Gianopulos opened the studio's segment at the annual CinemaCon film industry convention in Las Vegas with the news, praising director John Krasinski, who stars in the monster invasion thriller opposite real-life wife Emily Blunt.
"If you told me five years ago that an almost silent film starring the very funny guy Jim from 'The Office' would have been a hit at Paramount, I would have said, 'Well, I should go work at Paramount,'" said Gianopulos, who joined the studio a year ago.
"A Quiet Place," which regained top spot at the domestic box office over the weekend, has amassed more than $200 million in revenue worldwide against a budget of just $17 million and is Paramount's biggest hit since 2016's "Star Trek Beyond."
It has been a ray of light in a dark year or more for Paramount, which has struggled to make the box office impact of its "big six" rival studios, all of which are presenting at CinemaCon.
Since the third of the rebooted "Star Trek" movies recouped almost $350 million globally, Paramount's high-profile flops have included "Ben-Hur," "mother!" and Matt Damon vehicles "Suburbicon" and "Downsizing." 
Gianopulos acknowledged the studio had suffered a rough year but vowed that Paramount was "laying the foundation" to repeat its past successes.
"I'm incredibly confident that we have the right team, culture, and attitude in place to take Paramount to new heights," he said. "And we already started on that road to giant success with 'A Quiet Place.'"
Gianopulos announced a string of sequels in partnership with Skydance Media, including a new "Terminator" with Linda Hamilton from the original movie back on board with Arnold Schwarzenegger, "Top Gun: Maverick" with Tom Cruise -- and two new "Star Trek" films.
Tantalizingly, he offered no details and it remains unclear if these will be a continuation of the reboot franchise or if they include a previously announced "Star Trek" movie from "Pulp Fiction" director Quentin Tarantino. 
Paramount initially said after "Star Trek Beyond" came out that a fourth release would bring back "Thor" star Chris Hemsworth as Captain James Kirk's father, George.
J.J. Abrams, the creative force behind the 2009-16 reboots, wasn't at CinemaCon but he appeared onstage at Caesar's Palace to promote horror movie "Overlord," the first R-rated release from his Bad Robot production company.
Abrams scotched rumors that the World War II Nazi experiments shocker would be another release in the "Cloverfield" series.
But he added that he was planning a genuine theatrical sequel to 2008 found-footage thriller "Cloverfield," unlike the most recent film in the franchise, the critically panned Netflix February release "The Cloverfield Paradox." 
© Agence France-Presse

summary: Tom Cruise regaled CinemaCon Wednesday with a demonstration of his renowned stuntman skills, as Paramount Pictures led the showcase of its upcoming movies with a preview of "Mission: Impossible - Fallout."
title: Cruise control: 'MI6' star shows off stunt skills
story:
A post shared by Tom Cruise (@tomcruise) on Mar 27, 2018 at 2:38pm PDT


LAS VEGAS -- Tom Cruise regaled CinemaCon Wednesday with a demonstration of his renowned stuntman skills, as Paramount Pictures led the showcase of its upcoming movies with a preview of "Mission: Impossible - Fallout."
Appearing on stage with Christopher McQuarrie, who returned to direct the sixth movie in the long-running spy franchise, Cruise took up the last half-hour to explain the movie's marquee stunt.
The scene -- replayed from several angles for the CinemaCon crowd in Las Vegas -- involved a 340-kph "halo" ("high altitude, low open") skydive during which he grabs Henry Cavill's character in mid-air.
Cruise, a 55-year-old veteran of more than 50 movies, simulates going into a spin when he is hit by lightning almost immediately after leaping out of his plane at around 30,000 feet.
"This movie, it is without a doubt the most epic 'Mission' that we've made and it's a film that is adventurous, it's emotional, and it's really cutting-edge," Cruise told AFP backstage at Caesar's Palace.
Cruise, who is admired for performing his own increasingly ambitious stunts, said it took 106 jumps to get the three takes required, filmed partly by a cameraman falling backward out of the plane so he could keep the star's face in the shot, no more than a few inches away.



 

A post shared by Tom Cruise (@tomcruise) on Mar 7, 2018 at 12:52pm PST



Cruise and McQuarrie treated the crowd of convention-goers at Caesar's Palace in Las Vegas -- mostly theater operators -- to a 15-minute action sequence which many entertainment writers agreed was the best footage they'd seen this year at CinemaCon.
This included an eye-watering chase through the narrow streets of Paris involving a prison truck which plunges into the Seine, a further pursuit on motorbikes and a speedboat escape.
'Wing man'
"You're gonna see, in Paris, how beautiful the city is. I mean, Paris is a city of cinema," Cruise told AFP. "The ability to be able to make that film in that city, and the help that we were given enabled sequences that are just beautiful."
Cavill, best known for playing Superman in the DC Extended Universe movies distributed by Warner Bros., explained what it was like to be a passenger in a helicopter with Cruise at the helm.
He raised a big laugh when recalled how Cruise had flown him home at the end of a day of filming, and that he had fantasized he was Cruise's "wing man" in perhaps his most iconic film, "Top Gun" (1986).
"Obviously, my life was in Tom's hands when he was flying," the 34-year-old British actor told AFP on the sidelines of the presentation.
"He is an exceptional pilot and it's that kind of level. He's really doing this and I'm really sitting in the back. So when people are watching it, they know that all it will take is one little slip and we're all gone."
British comic actor Simon Pegg, who plays ship's engineer Scotty in J.J. Abrams's "Star Trek" movies, has been a major part of the "Mission: Impossible" franchise since the third film, 12 years ago.
"J.J. Abrams saw 'Shaun of the Dead,' our little British indie horror comedy and liked it and, as he does, said, 'I'd like to work with him -- I'll call him," Pegg recalled.
"He rang me at the office -- me and Edgar (Wright) were writing 'Hot Fuzz' at the time -- and he sort of said, 'Do you want to be in 'Mission Impossible 3?'"
The pair bonded, leading to Pegg's starring role in all of the subsequent "Star Trek" and "Mission Impossible" movies, some directed and all produced by Abrams.
© Agence France-Presse

summary: Actor Hafthor Julius Bjornsson, who is more popularly known as The Mountain or Ser Gregor Clegane in the hit HBO series “Game of Thrones,” is now in the Philippines.
title: LOOK: 'Game of Thrones' star in PH for World's Strongest Man
story:
MANILA - Actor Hafthor Julius Bjornsson, who is more popularly known as The Mountain or Ser Gregor Clegane in the hit HBO series “Game of Thrones,” is now in the Philippines.
According to a post by the Department of Tourism (DOT) on its Facebook page, Bjornsson is visiting the country to participate in the World’s Strongest Man (WSM), which is being hosted by the Philippines.

PH to show off tourist spots in World's Strongest Man hosting

In an effort to strengthen the country's bid as a worthwhile venue for international sports events, the DOT facilitated the hosting of the WSM to boost sports tourism, particularly in the locations where the events will be held.
At least 30 competitors will vie for the 41st WSM championship, which involves a course of 16 events – including pulling a truck or an airplane, carrying a refrigerator, lifting an Atlas stone weighing over 1,000 pounds, and lifting huge logs.
British strongman Eddie Hall will defend the WSM title that he won last year in Botswana.
Various WSM events will take place simultaneously for nine days, in different locations both in and outside of Metro Manila starting on April 28. There will be four qualifying days (April 28 to May 1), three rest days, and two days for the finals (May 5-6).
The other locations are: Intramuros, Manila; Bonifacio Global City, Taguig; and the University of the Philippines campus in Diliman, Quezon City.

summary: A teaser for the upcoming mystery-thriller “Eerie” has been released online.
title: First glimpse of thriller 'Eerie' starring Charo Santos, Bea Alonzo
story:
A teaser for the upcoming mystery-thriller “Eerie” has been released online.
The one-minute clip uploaded on Facebook shows its lead stars Charo Santos and Bea Alonzo in an exclusive all-girls school. Both play nuns in the film -- Santos is the Mother Superior while Alonzo is a guidance counselor.
Directed by Mikhail Red, the movie is the first collaboration of ABS-CBN’s Star Cinema and Singapore’s Aurora Media.
A release date of the movie has yet to be revealed.

 
In a previous interview, Alonzo praised “Eerie” as one of her best movies.
“I can’t really share much kasi medyo may pagka mystery-thriller siya so hindi ko alam kung hanggang saan 'yung pwede kong mai-share sa inyo. But definitely, isa ito sa pinakamaganda na nagawa ko. It’s something that I would watch,” she said.
But more than the plot, Alonzo said what makes the movie truly memorable for her is the fact that she was able to act with Santos.
“Minsan nasa gitna kami ng mga eksena, hindi pa rin ako makapaniwala na siya 'yung kaeksena ko. Iba pala talaga siguro kapag ganun na karami ang pelikula na nagawa mo at siguro iba na nakatrabaho niya sila Mike de Leon, mga great actors of her generation, and of the new generation. Parang less 'yung work for me because parang nagfi-feed na lang ako sa energy niya,” she said.
Aside from Alonzo and Santos, “Eerie” also features Maxene Magalona and Jake Cuenca.

Ito ang pag-amin ni Elmo Magalona tungkol sa love team partner nito na si Janella Salvador.
Sa "Magandang Buhay" nitong Huwebes, matapos basahin ang liham mula kay Janella na binabati siya para sa kanyang kaarawan, pinasalamatan ni Elmo ang aktres sa magagandang mga bagay na naidulot nito sa kanyang buhay.
"Nata-touch talaga ako sa message ni (Janella) because she's one of the reasons why I'm a better person now. Thank you," ani Elmo na katabi ang kanyang inang si Pia at kapatid na si Maxene na parehong natutuwa kay Janella.
"Ako, happy ako na happy sila kasi mahirap 'yon kapag hindi sila suportado. I'm really happy na ganoon ang pag-receive nila kay Janella," ani Elmo.
Ayon kay Pia at Maxene, masaya sila na nakatagpo si Elmo ng isang kaibigang tulad ni Janella.
"We get along talaga at hindi mahirap sa amin (ni Janella) na mag-usap ng stuff about life," dagdag na hirit ni Elmo.
Bisitahin ang Patrol.PH para sa iba pang mga balita.

summary: JM de Guzman admitted that he and Jessy Mendiola haven’t had the chance to talk again since he made his showbiz comeback following years of rehabilitation.
title: What happened when JM, Jessy crossed paths
story:
A post shared by JM De Guzman (@1migueldeguzman) on Feb 17, 2018 at 9:54pm PST



MANILA – JM de Guzman admitted that he and Jessy Mendiola haven’t had the chance to talk again since he made his showbiz comeback following years of rehabilitation.
 
“Wala lang pong opportunity,” the actor simply said when asked if they are not okay.
De Guzman, however, mentioned that they crossed each other’s paths one time at a restaurant.
“Pagdaan niya, nakaupo ako sa table tapos sabi nung mga friends ko, ‘Uy si Jessy tumingin dito sa table natin, nakita ka.’ Pagtingin ko, ‘Ah siya nga.’ Hindi nagtagpo 'yung [tingin] namin,” he narrated.
Nonetheless, de Guzman is happy for his former girlfriend who is now in a relationship with Luis Manzano.
“Opo. Masaya naman po ako doon. Basta kung saan po siya masaya,” he said.
Does he somehow blame their failed relationship for his drug problem?
“Hindi ko puwedeng sisisihin doon eh kasi lahat naman ng tao nagdadaan sa kahit anong problema,” he said.
“Isinisisi ko lahat ng nangyari sa maling choices na ginawa ko to deal with my problems,” de Guzman added.
Currently, de Guzman is busy working on his comeback series “Araw Gabi” also starring Barbie Imperial. It will start airing on ABS-CBN on April 30.

summary: LOS ANGELES, United States - Kanye West said on Wednesday that he had fired his manager and suggested he may run for US president in a frenetic Twitter spree in which he promised four new albums and compared himself to Henry Ford and Walt Disney.
title: Yeezy to Disney: Kanye West shatters year-long Twitter silence
story:
Recording artist Kanye West performs during the closing ceremony for the 2015 Pan Am Games at Pan Am Ceremonies Venue in Toronto, Canada, July 26, 2015. Mandatory Credit: Matt Detrich-USA TODAY Sports via REUTERS/File Photo


LOS ANGELES, United States - Kanye West said on Wednesday that he had fired his manager and suggested he may run for US president in a frenetic Twitter spree in which he promised four new albums and compared himself to Henry Ford and Walt Disney.
The rapper and fashion designer, 40, who has emerged from a year's Twitter silence, also praised US President Donald Trump, saying that he might not agree with him on everything but "the mob can't make me not love him. We are both dragon energy. He is my brother."
Trump later tweeted, "Thank you Kanye, very cool!"

pic.twitter.com/YyUw0mCKov
— KANYE WEST (@kanyewest) April 25, 2018

In the past 10 days, West has had a spate of Twitter posts, sometimes weighing in as often as 20 times an hour on wide-ranging themes.
West, who has won 21 Grammy Awards over his career for songs including "Jesus Walks" and "No Church in the Wild," was admitted to a psychiatric facility in Los Angeles in November 2016 and abruptly canceled a world tour after a week of no-shows, curtailed concerts, and political rants.
He has since adopted a low public profile.
West, who in 2015 said he was considering running for the White House, also returned to his own presidential ambitions, tweeting simply "2024".
"When we become president we have to change the name of the plane from Air Force one to Yeezy force one," he added, referring to his Yeezy fashion line.
"I am this generations Ford Hughes Jobs Disney," West tweeted on Wednesday, apparently referring to Henry Ford, Howard Hughes, Steve Jobs and Walt Disney.
"I no longer have a manager. I can't be managed," he wrote in another Tweet. West's manager, Scooter Braun, did not reply to a request for comment.
In the last several days, West has said he would release four new albums in June.
West's representatives did not return a request for comment, but his wife, Kim Kardashian, addressed him directly on the social media platform after he tweeted a photo that was apparently taken inside the couple's Southern California home.
"Ummm babe. We had a rule to not show our home on social media! Soooo can we now allow KUWTK filming in the home?," Kardashian wrote on Wednesday, referring to the TV show "Keeping Up With the Kardashians."

Aquino appears to be referring to the fact that "I Love You, Hater" was the film's announced title last Friday, when she attended its story conference as a comebacking Star Cinema talent. Yet, it wasn't written on the clapperboard, as practiced in filmmaking.



 

I have a feeling we have a new title... 1st day & i must commend @garciajoshuae - as soon as i arrived, lumapit sya agad & may cute kwentuhan na kami... @juliabarretto finished taping late for the pilot of the new #joshlia soap- bagong ligo, alam kong pagod- pero ang beautiful pa rin & as soon as she arrived NAKANGITING bumati & good vibes ang dala. #lovelovelove 🌈

W/ 100% honesty & the utmost humility- AAMININ KO, I MISSED THE MAGIC OF MOVIE MAKING. Finished our 1st sequence, napakahusay ni @garciajoshuae. 🤩 Thank you @starcinema, napakasarap bumalik sa 1st love ko. #shooting #lovelovelove ♥️♥️♥️

summary: Curtis considers finishing the London Marathon one of her foremost achievements, but she has made no secret of her struggles leading up to the race.
title: WATCH: Exhausted Anne cries and turns back to Erwan at London marathon
story:
Anne Curtis considers finishing the 42-kilometer London Marathon as one of her foremost achievements, but the local superstar has made no secret of her struggles leading up to and during the April 22 event.



 

A post shared by Anne Curtis (@annecurtissmith) on Apr 24, 2018 at 8:56pm PDT



The 33-year-old actress earlier shared with her fans, via social media, that her five-hour finish included moments of her nearly giving up because of exhaustion and the unexpected heat.

LOOK: Nearly giving up, Anne Curtis finishes London Marathon

She pushed on, however, bearing in mind she joined the marathon not only as a personal conquest, but as part of her "For the Filipino Youth" mission under UNICEF-Philippines, of which she is an appointed Celebrity Advocate.



 

A post shared by UNICEF Philippines (@unicefphils) on Mar 4, 2015 at 9:32pm PST



Curtis has said she also drew her strength from UK-based Filipinos who cheered her on from the sidelines. But her biggest supporter was her husband, Erwan Heussaff, who accompanied Curtis every step of the way, as seen in a video shot and edited by the restaurateur and vlogger.
The minute-long clip, uploaded on Curtis' official fan page on Facebook, shows the "It's Showtime" host arriving in London, touring the city, and doing final training only a few days before the marathon.

 
In a portion of the video that shows the actual run, Curtis appeared to spot Heussaff, who was filming from the sidelines, and drew encouragement from him. Initially set to continue running, Curtis then turned back to her husband and started shedding tears, telling him, "I'm tired."
"It's okay," Heussaff replied, kissing her forehead.
The intimate moment between the couple was a rare look into their relationship, which they have both consciously kept off the limelight despite being public figures.



 

A post shared by Anne Curtis (@annecurtissmith) on Jan 9, 2018 at 8:01pm PST



Heussaff has avoided talking about Curtis in most interviews, while the latter is seen to be careful when it comes to details she shares, whenever asked about her husband and building a family together.

story:

Sa media conference ng pelikulang "My Two Mommies," kung saan kabilang sa cast si Soriano, ikinuwento ng 53 anyos na aktres na wala siyang balak magbukas ng social media account dahil puno ito ng away at negativity.
"Ayoko ng mga ganoon (away). Sa edad kong ito, di ako rerespetuhin ng kausap ko? Baka masampal ko," sabi ni Soriano.
"I am a mother of two boys and then I don't like people talking to me that way. Respect is very important to me," dagdag ng aktres.
Kinikilala naman ni Soriano ang mga account ng kaniyang mga tagahanga pero binalaan din niya ang mga ito na magpakita ng magandang asal.
"Mga magulang niyo, gusto niyo bang makita ang mga magulang niyo na binabastos ng ibang tao? Sabi nila, 'Hindi po.' 'Yon naman pala e, sabi ko matuto kayong rumespeto," kuwento ni Soriano.
Nagbigay rin si Soriano ng ilang detalye hinggil sa bago niyang ABS-CBN series na "The General's Daughter," kung saan makakasama niya si Angel Locsin.

Maricel excited for TV comeback: 'Na-miss ko lahat ito!'

summary: South Korean boy band EXO has been making waves since their debut in 2012.
title: 8 songs to get you started on K-pop group EXO
story:
MANILA - South Korean boy band EXO has been making waves since its debut in 2012. 
Composed of Chinese and Korean members, EXO has set itself apart from other Korean boy groups from the start. The group debuted as two independent groups, EXO-M and EXO-K, promoting simultaneously in China and South Korea.
Originally composed of 12 members, EXO now has nine members - Suho, Chen, Chanyeol, Baekhyun, Xiumin, D.O., Kai, Sehun and Lay.
EXO is currently promoting their fourth album "The War" through their concert tour, Exo Planet #4 - The Elyxion. Fans can get a glimpse of their favorite group as they fly to Manila for a concert on April 28.
Here are some of group's hits songs for those who want to get a taste of EXO's music.













MAMA
When EXO debuted in April 2012, the group didn't just walk into the K-pop scene. They made an explosive entrance with "MAMA," a punk-esque track laced with Gregorian chants. The music video, lasting six minutes long, also includes an extensive narration explaining the group's unique concept of being aliens possessing superpowers.


GROWL
Over a year after its debut, EXO already had a steady following. But it was the addictive and funky "Growl" that served as a game-changer and brought the group mainstream success. It remains their most iconic song and even listed among Billboard's Top 100 Greatest Boy Band Songs of All Time.


OVERDOSE
Produced by American R&B/pop duo The Underdogs, "Overdose," released in May 2014, likens a man's intense attraction to the feeling of a "sweet" drug overdose. The music video is a visual feast, showing members performing choreography in a labrynth-like setting.


CALL ME BABY
Released in 2015, "Call Me Baby" is part of EXO's "Exodus" album as its lead single. The music video features handsome cars and the members clad in leather, dancing in what looks like an empty warehouse.


MONSTER
One year after the success of "Exodus," EXO once again released another masterpiece. Unlike their previous singles, "Monster" has a darker and more intense feel. The music video features the members, bruised and clad in black, as they sing about obsession and love.


FOR LIFE
Released in December 2016 as the title track off the special winter album, "For Life" has EXO bringing warmth to the otherwise cold season. The group proves that they can veer away from the theatrics and high-energy choreography seen in their usual pop releases, and deliver soulful ballads.


KO KO BOP
The lead single of the album "The War," "Ko Ko Bop" combined reggae and electronic dance music. It's music video features the boys in colorful outfits having fun in a tropical paradise.
The song's catcy chorus also launched a worldwide dance craze, with fans from different countries dancing to the beat.


POWER
Released in September 5, 2017, "Power" is part of the repackaged album "The War: The Power of Music." It is produced by LDN Noise, and falls under the electronic dance music category. The music video shows the boys in a made-up, video game like universe, fighting a robot with their weapons and unique charm.

summary: Hollywood rolled out the big guns at the CinemaCon convention on Tuesday as Disney and Warner Bros. locked horns with rival presentations of their upcoming movies.
title: Disney, Warner Bros. go head to head at CinemaCon
story:
A post shared by CinemaCon (@cinemacon) on Apr 23, 2018 at 9:01am PDT



LAS VEGAS -- Hollywood rolled out the big guns at the CinemaCon convention on Tuesday as Disney and Warner Bros. locked horns with rival presentations of their upcoming movies.
Disney kicked off the day of the big beasts at the annual Las Vegas film industry get-together with footage from its hotly anticipated "Solo: A Star Wars Story," while Warner answered the challenge by wowing fans with new images from "Aquaman."
Disney traditionally keeps back its juiciest surprises for its own biennial D23 Expo, but delighted delegates with a look at the first meeting between Alden Ehrenreich's young Han Solo and Donald Glover's Lando Calrissian.
Scenes from the Ron Howard movie -- the second "Star Wars" spinoff after "Rogue One" (2016) -- showed the pair's encounter in a sleazy dive bar on a snowbound world, watched by a colorful menagerie of new alien characters. 
There was also a glimpse of what looked like the pivotal moment in "Star Wars" lore when Han wins the Millennium Falcon starship from Lando in a card game.
'Perfect stories'
Hollywood decamps to the Nevada desert for four days every year, taking over Caesar's Palace to show theater owners what they can expect to be making their money from over the following 12 to 24 months.
While most studios wheel out their biggest stars to promote their performances, Disney opted this year to let its movies do the talking. 
The audience was treated to preview footage of Tim Burton's "Dumbo," Jon Favreau's "The Lion King," and a behind-the-scenes making-of featurette for Guy Ritchie's "Aladdin." All three movies are due out next year.
"Aladdin is one of those perfect stories. It just burrows down inside of you," the movie's star Will Smith said in a preview video.
CinemaCon was also shown a new trailer for "Ant-Man and the Wasp" as well as the opening sequence of animation "Incredibles 2" from Disney-owned Pixar and scenes from Rob Marshall's upcoming holiday release, "Mary Poppins Returns," starring Emily Blunt.
There was a marked difference in presentation style as Warner Bros. previewed its slate later in the day, adding some welcome pizzazz with a roll call of its biggest names.
It set out its stall with a parade of its DC Comics superheroes, treating delegates to behind-the-scenes footage from "Aquaman" and sending director James Wan onstage to introduce a "work-in-progress" trailer.
The footage of what is expected to be one of this year's big Christmas films gave delegates a glimpse of the mythical underwater world of Atlantis, its distinctly humanoid residents riding sea horses into battle.
Comedian and actor Will Arnett, playing host on behalf of Warner Bros., lightheartedly chided "Aquaman" star Jason Momoa for indulging in some rather colorful language.
"You went from 'Game of Thrones' to 'Aquaman,'" Arnett told the musclebound 38-year-old Polynesian-American, his mouth curling into a smirk. 
"Does it feel good to work in something that's more realistic?"
Cheeky questions
"Have you ever wanted to play a character who wears a shirt?" Arnett demanded, as Momoa, joined onstage by co-stars Amber Heard, Patrick Wilson and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, took the cheeky line of enquiry in good spirit.
Warner showed a brief sizzle reel of the numerous superhero projects in its DC Extended Universe pipeline, featuring David F. Sandberg's "Shazam!" and Patty Jenkins chatting about "Wonder Woman 2," which she revealed will be set in the 1980s.
The cast of "Ocean's 8" -- led by Sandra Bullock and Cate Blanchett -- turned up to pique excitement over the female-skewed heist spin-off, and Bradley Cooper appeared for "A Star is Born." 
A trailer for the romance, which he stars in and directs, was praised by the Hollywood press for the chemistry between the "Hangover" actor and pop sensation Lady Gaga. 
"I always wanted to tell a love story and this project was around before and it always stayed with me... to me, music is the purest way you can communicate love," Cooper said.
STX Films -- in business for just three years -- closed out CinemaCon Tuesday with a showcase of nautical thriller "Adrift," starring Shailene Woodley ("Divergent").
Woodley, 26, described the movie as "a survival story that's really about true love" and tenacity in the face of adversity. 
"It's not every day you get to work with a filmmaker who is willing to shoot this thing on the ocean," she added.
Jennifer Garner introduced revenge thriller "Peppermint," and STX also showcased the upcoming "Second Act," "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat" and Peter Berg's spy drama "Mile 22," starring Mark Wahlberg and Lauren Cohan.
© Agence France-Presse

summary: A little less than a month before her royal wedding to Britain's Prince Harry, Meghan Markle has said "I do" -- on television.
title: Meghan Markle ties the knot -- but not with Prince Harry
story:
LOS ANGELES -- A little less than a month before her royal wedding to Britain's Prince Harry, Meghan Markle has said "I do" -- on television.
Markle fans who can't wait until the actress walks down the aisle next month can tune into the seventh season finale of the legal drama "Suits" -- which sees Markle's character Rachel tie the knot with Mike, played by Patrick J. Adams.
"I wanted to marry you from the second I met you," Mike says in a preview of the episode, to air Wednesday.
"You are the husband I've always wanted," Rachel says, marking a happy ending for the two actors leaving the series.
"We know there's another wedding on the horizon for Ms. Markle but just seeing her here in all of her bridal resplendence is a fairytale come true," said the network USA, which airs the series, on its website.
The characters Mike and Rachel had already tried getting married in a previous season -- but police arrested the former and thwarted the nuptial plans. 
Shortly after announcing her engagement to Prince Harry, the future Duchess, 36, said she would leaving acting to focus on humanitarian work.
Her final appearance on "Suits" -- in which she has starred since 2011 -- will be a dress rehearsal of sorts for her big day on May 19, when she will marry Prince Harry in a chapel inside Windsor Castle before 600 invited guests.
Another 2,640 people will be welcomed onto the castle grounds.
American, mixed-race and "fiercely independent," Markle is widely seen as a breath of fresh air for Britain's royal family.
"I was born and raised in Los Angeles, a California girl who lives by the ethos that most things can be cured with either yoga, the beach, or a few avocados," she once wrote. 
She will be the second American to join the British monarchy after socialite Wallis Simpson -- who married King Edward VIII after he abdicated, and like Markle had once divorced prior to marrying royalty.
© Agence France-Presse

title: Dating sexy star Ramona Revilla, mommy na ng triplets
story:

MANILA -- Naaalala niyo pa ba ang dating sexy star na si Ramona Revilla?
Lumaki sa Romblon si Ramona na nagtungo sa Maynila para tuparin ang pangarap na maging artista. Sa paggabay ng kanyang ina, nakaipon at nakapundar si Ramona.
Matapos iwanan ang showbiz ay nagtungo sa Amerika ang aktres at doon nakilala ang asawang si Fred Farrell, isang US naval engineer.
Noong 2013, isinilang ni Ramona ang kanilang triplets na puro babae.
Sa "Magandang Buhay" nitong Miyerkoles, ipinakilala ni Ramona sa publiko ang kanyang mga anak na sina Fersiana, Freohsyl at Frederie.
"Magkakaiba ang mga ugali nila. This one (Fersiana) ate ito. Bossy ito. (Freohsyl) she's acting really like's she's a baby and Frederie mahiyain 'yan... they really care for each other," aniya.
Binalikan din ni Ramona ang karanasan habang pinagbubuntis ang mga anak.
"Noong before ako mabuntis, I was so active, lagi akong naggi-gym. Sabi ko kaya ko ito. But when I found out na triplets, my doctor suggested, 'Are you sure kakayanin mo ito?' We decided, my husband and I talked that night, I said, 'We are going to do this.' Dapat check-up lang 'yun nung doctor, sabi ng doctor, 'I guess lalabas na.' ... Two days in labor. After two days gusto na nilang lumabas. With the miracle of God naging okay lahat," ani Ramona.
Kahit hindi madali ang pagkakaroon ng triplet, napapagaan ito sa tulong ng kanyang asawa.
"Ang hirap sa States, walang yaya pero masaya. But I have a good husband too, tumutulong siya talaga," ani Ramona.
 
Nasa bansa ngayon si Ramona at kanyang mga anak para magbakasyon.

summary: NEW YORK, United States - Rapper Meek Mill won freedom from prison Tuesday after an unusually harsh sentence triggered protests that pointed to racial biases in US probation laws.
title: Rapper Meek Mill freed after uproar over harsh term
story:
A post shared by Meek Mill (@meekmill) on Apr 24, 2018 at 1:09pm PDT



NEW YORK, United States - Rapper Meek Mill won freedom from prison Tuesday after an unusually harsh sentence triggered protests that pointed to racial biases in US probation laws.
The 30-year-old Philadelphia rapper, who was jailed in November over a case from his teenage years, was ordered out on bail by Pennsylvania's Supreme Court.
As he walked at least temporarily free, Mill thanked supporters who campaigned for him as well as the Philadelphia district attorney's office that sided with him.
"I understand that many people of color across the country don't have that luxury and I plan to use my platform to shine a light on those issues," Mill wrote on Twitter.
"In the meantime, I plan to work closely with my legal team to overturn this unwarranted conviction and look forward to reuniting with my family and resuming my music career," said Mill, whose last album "Wins and Losses" reached number three on the US chart.
Mill, raised by a single mother after his father was killed, was thrown into jail over his arrest on drug and gun possession charges in 2008, well before the rapper born as Robert Rihmeek Williams achieved stardom.
At what had looked like a routine hearing, Philadelphia judge Genece Brinkley handed Mill a term of between two and four years for violating terms of parole, including scheduling shows that conflicted with the court schedule and entering a publicized scuffle in St. Louis.
Ordering Mill out on bail, the state's Supreme Court cited "credibility issues" over a police officer who was a witness.
Mill has said he was badly beaten during the 2008 arrest and placed a bloody mug shot of himself as the cover of his "DC4" mixtape.
The Supreme Court did not throw out the case but asked the local court to reach a resolution within 60 days. It also did not remove Brinkley but noted she "may opt to remove herself from presiding over this matter."
In addition to street rallies, Mill enjoyed the support of celebrities including hip-hop mogul Jay-Z, whose Roc Nation management signed Mill.
In an op-ed last year for The New York Times, Jay-Z said that Mill's case was "just one example of how our criminal justice system entraps and harasses hundreds of thousands of black people every day."
Probation, which dates from English common law, was initially seen as a compassionate way for courts to grant freedom to people who pose little risk.
But a survey by The Marshall Project, a non-profit news organization that covers the US judicial system, found that at least 61,250 people -- and probably far more -- are in prison across the United States for minor parole violations like missing appointments, failing drug tests or staying out past curfew.

summary: A massage therapist is suing Lee for sexual assault and battery, accusing him of inappropriate touching and misconduct during two sessions last year in Chicago.
title: Comic book icon Stan Lee sued for sexual assault
story:
A massage therapist is suing Stan Lee of Marvel Comics fame for sexual assault and battery, accusing him of inappropriate touching and misconduct during two sessions last year in Chicago.
Maria Carballo filed a 5-count lawsuit Monday, claiming Lee assaulted her by fondling himself and touching her with his genitalia.
The lawsuit claims the incidents took place in April 2017, when the 95-year-old co-creator of many superhero characters, including Black Panther and Spider-Man, was in the Midwestern city for the Chicago Comic & Entertainment Expo. 
Lee's attorney Jonathan Freund denied the allegations to the Chicago Tribune newspaper.
"He is a high-profile public figure and I think it's a shakedown," Freund was quoted by the Tribune as saying. 
"The guy is 95, I don't think he would do that."
Carballo's lawsuit claims she was sent on two occasions to Lee's hotel suite at the McCormick Place Hyatt Regency.
During the first massage, Lee allegedly fondled himself, causing Carballo to stop and leave early.
Carballo claims that Lee apologized through her employer and she returned for a second massage appointment the following day, during which she employed a massage technique using the feet instead of hands.
She accuses Lee of moving her foot against his genitals, prompting her to leave once again. 
The alleged incidents predate the global spread of the #MeToo and #Timesup campaigns.
Carballo was initially fearful that complaining about Lee's actions would negatively affect her career, according to the law firm representing her.
"After seeing other women fight to be treated with dignity and respect, I decided, me too," Carballo said in a statement released by the Chicago-based firm Cunningham Lopez LLP.
The lawsuit is seeking at least $50,000, as well as punitive damages and attorney's fees for each of the five counts.
Lee has faced a similar claim before. In January, the Daily Mail reported on allegations of sexual assault and harassment by nurses who cared for Lee at his Los Angeles home.
Lee's representatives denied those allegations.
The comic book legend has also been the subject of rumors of elder abuse in the hands of associates and his daughter, and has denied those claims as well.

story:
She's still floating on cloud 9 after her Coachella experience. 
And you can't blame Roxanne Barcelo for refusing to come down as not only did she get to watch amazing live music and attend wild parties; she also met her idol, supermodel Bella Hadid. 
On Instagram, she posted a a series of selfies with Bella, the little-known but equally gorgeous younger sister of Gigi Hadid, with the caption: "She is the coolest ever! #imofficiallyconfused". 



 

A post shared by Roxanne Barcelo (@roxannebarcelo) on Apr 19, 2018 at 7:32pm PDT



That was just one of the highlights of Barcelo's trip to California for the Coachella Valley music and arts festival, one of the largest music festivals in the world. 
She reminisced about her experience in another Instagram post, describing it as "one of the happiest" moments of her life. 
"It all gave me a feeling I had almost forgotten... the feeling of being a free spirit again," she wrote. "That pure moment of awakening... realizing that life can be good... and fun!" 
Turning a tad sentimental, Barcelo, who had just recently broken up with her boyfriend of 4 years, Will Devaughn, also explained that everyone deserves a break from the "challenging times." 
"Live a little. Dance. Love more. Cause life is too short to be sad.. So forget about the past and start over," she said. 



 

A post shared by Roxanne Barcelo (@roxannebarcelo) on Apr 20, 2018 at 7:46am PDT






 

A post shared by Roxanne Barcelo (@roxannebarcelo) on Apr 19, 2018 at 6:47am PDT






 

A post shared by Roxanne Barcelo (@roxannebarcelo) on Apr 19, 2018 at 4:24am PDT

The clip sees Hardy's Eddie Brock coming to terms with becoming the new host of a mysterious, super-powered black symbiote.

title: Xian Gaza asks out another celeb, this time with 'Avengers' movie poster
story:
A post shared by XIAN GAZA (@xiangaza) on Feb 15, 2018 at 2:19am PST



Xian Gaza, who made headlines in 2017 after asking out "The Blood Sisters" star Erich Gonzales with a billboard ad in Manila, is at it again.
Gonzales, it can be recalled, ultimately declined that coffee date, saying she was discouraged by the "exposés" about the self-proclaimed millionaire CEO -- among them, that he "scammed" the family of another actress, Ella Cruz.

Why Erich decided not to have coffee date with fan




 

A post shared by Erich Gonzales (@erichgg) on Nov 26, 2017 at 4:13am PST



Just two weeks ago, on April 12, Gaza was arrested by Malabon police over an investment scam, or for violating the Anti-Bouncing Checks Law. He was released on bail a day later.

Xian Gaza, nakalaya na: ‘I’m ready for a new life’

Undeterred, Gaza hasn't stopped posting updates, apparently intended to be funny, on his social media pages. One such post, which is now going viral, is another date request to a female celebrity.



 

A post shared by Myrtle Sarrosa (@myrtlegail) on Feb 23, 2018 at 4:03am PST



Gaza is now asking out former "Pinoy Big Brother" housemate Myrtle Sarrosa. Though not as extravagant as his billboard ad for Gonzales, Gaza rode on the popularity of the upcoming "Avengers" film, editing its poster to include his and Sarrosa's face.

 
In its caption, he wrote: "I don't know how to say this but you know what, I crush you. Myrtle Sarrosa, will you watch Avengers Infinity War with me? . . . P.S. Sorry hindi ko na afford ipabillboard pa ‘to, nyeamumulubi na kasi me."
It's unclear if Gaza is serious with the gesture. 



 

A post shared by XIAN GAZA (@xiangaza) on Apr 23, 2018 at 5:33am PDT



Going by the caption, however, what's apparent is he's taken in stride the mockery he received during the episode with Gonzales. "Nyeam," his expression that made him the subject of jokes, is now a term he uses deliberately for humor, and is even now a print-on merchandise he started.
As of writing, Sarrosa has yet to respond to Gaza.



 

A post shared by Myrtle Sarrosa (@myrtlegail) on Feb 4, 2018 at 5:39am PST

title: ALAMIN: 'Road to recovery' ni JM de Guzman
story:
Watch more in iWantv or TFC.tv
Sa kaniyang muling pagbabalik-showbiz, ibinahagi ng aktor na si JM de Guzman kung ano ang mga hakbang na ginagawa niya patungo sa kaniyang muling pagbangon at pagharap sa entertainment industry. 
Lead actor ngayon si De Guzman sa teleseryeng “Precious Hearts Presents: Araw Gabi” katambal ang teen actress na si Barbie Imperial. 

JM, Barbie open up about their daring scenes in 'Araw, Gabi'

Aminado ang aktor na natigil ang kaniyang showbiz career dalawang taon na ang nakakaraan dahil sa pagkalulong sa bisyo.

WATCH: JM de Guzman opens up about time in drug rehab

Para maiwasan ang mga pagkakamali noon, regular na dumadalo ang aktor sa therapy kasama ang kaniyang pamilya. 
“Meron po kaming monthly requirement to attend therapy sessions nu'ng peers ko sa 'loob,' kasama 'yung family namin para tuloy-tuloy 'yung support,” ani De Guzman.
Ibinahagi rin ni De Guzman ang mga aral na natutunan niya sa kaniyang "road to recovery."
"Kailangan maging humble pa rin. Ako, I seek help always sa recovery stage. Hindi naman siya natatapos agad eh, lifelong struggle ito. Kapag tumigil ako humingi ng tulong doon ako puwedeng madapa po ulit,” ayon kay De Guzman.
Sa muli niyang pagsabak sa showbiz, handa na umano si De Guzman para sa mga hamon na kaniyang haharapin.
"[S]a pinagdaanan ko ngayon, medyo skilled na 'ko with coping para ma-manage ko ang sarili ko sa oras ng dilim," aniya.
Magsisimula ang serye ni De Guzman at Imperial sa Abril 30 sa Kapamilya Gold.

--Ulat ni Jeff Fernando, ABS-CBN News

summary: Madonna lost Monday a nearly year-long bid to stop an auction of intimate items, including a breakup letter from rap legend Tupac Shakur.
title: Madonna loses bid to stop auction of intimate items
story:
A post shared by Madonna (@madonna) on Apr 8, 2018 at 7:15pm PDT



NEW YORK -- Madonna lost Monday a nearly year-long bid to stop an auction of intimate items, including a breakup letter from rap legend Tupac Shakur.
A judge ruled that the Material Girl had directed her legal action against the wrong target in going after Darlene Lutz, a New York art dealer who helped Madonna build a collection before falling out with her.
Lutz had been the main source for 22 items, including love letters, cassettes and a hairbrush, that were up for sale by auction house Gotta Have Rock and Roll until a judge issued an injunction in July.
New York Judge Gerald Lebovits, in a ruling based on narrow legal grounds rather than on Madonna's claims of violations of privacy, agreed with Lutz, who said that her disputes with Madonna were settled by a 2004 legal agreement between the former friends.
Lebovits, in a decision dated last week but made public Monday, also questioned why Madonna was pursuing Lutz and not the singer's assistants, who Madonna said had handed items to the art dealer.
"If plaintiff's allegations are accepted as true -- that Lutz received the letters through inadvertent actions of the plaintiff's assistants," Lebovits wrote, then her case against Lutz is "time-barred and improper."
The auction house said it would press ahead in July with the sale of Madonna merchandise including the offending letter from Tupac. 
In a statement, Gotta Have Rock and Roll said it had been confident about the case and had done "substantial due diligence" before first announcing the auction.
Judd Grossman, a lawyer for Lutz, called the court decision "a total win."
"Ms. Lutz is now free to do with her property as she pleases without any continued interference by Madonna," Grossman said.
A lawyer for Madonna did not immediately respond to requests for comment.
Private letter from Tupac
The items up for auction -- part of a collection of some 100 pieces -- included the 1995 letter from Tupac, who would be shot dead a year later. Madonna has only recently spoken publicly about their then-secret relationship.
In the letter breaking up with Madonna, Tupac said his image would suffer by dating a white woman and voiced pain at an interview in which the singer said, "I'm off to rehabilitate all the rappers and basketball players."
Madonna, in winning a temporary block of the auction in July, told the court that her celebrity status "does not obviate my right to maintain my privacy, including with regard to highly personal items."
Lutz's lawyers accused Madonna of a "personal vendetta" and mocked her appeals for privacy, noting that the auction included a pair of underwear she had mailed to a lover.
© Agence France-Presse

summary: Barbie Imperial admitted that it took a while before she and JM de Guzman became comfortable with each other on the set of their upcoming series “Precious Hearts Romances: Araw, Gabi.”
title: JM, Barbie open up about their daring scenes in 'Araw, Gabi'
story:
MANILA -- Barbie Imperial admitted that it took a while before she and JM de Guzman became comfortable with each other on the set of their upcoming series “Precious Hearts Romances: Araw, Gabi.”
In fact, she said that her first impression of de Guzman is that he is "masungit."
“Kasi hindi siya tumatawa masyado. Pero nakuha ko naman po 'yung kiliti niya. Sa taping po kasi, minsan lang siya mag-smile,” she told reporters on Monday.
When asked how she broke the ice between them, Imperial narrated: “Ang ginawa ko, pinansin ko siya ng isang beses lang, hindi katulad nung dati na, ‘Uy kamusta 'yung araw mo?’ Siguro hinanap-hanap niya 'yung ganun. Tapos sabi niya sa akin, ‘Bakit hindi mo ako pinapansin?’ Pa-hard to get.”
To his defense, de Guzman said he was just internalizing his character every time he is on location.
“Kaya ako ganun kasi 'yung character ko is ganun. So kapag nasa set ako, tina-try ko na i-imbibe na rin sa sarili ko. 'Yun lang 'yun. Ang hirap mo kayang hindi mapansin,” he told his new leading lady.



 

A post shared by JM De Guzman (@1migueldeguzman) on Feb 10, 2018 at 2:17am PST



Meanwhile, the two revealed that they have a number of daring scenes on the show. Were they immediately at ease doing these scenes?
“May ilang noong sa workshop po pero napaghandaan naman po [naming ni Barbie yung scenes],” de Guzman said.
Imperial, for her part, confessed: “Siyempre po nung una, iniisip ko pa lang po, medyo naiilang na po ako. Kasi hindi po ako sanay sa ganung role. Pero nag-workshop po kaming dalawa so nung nag-taping po kami, medyo okay naman po.”
The actress said her rumored boyfriend, actor Paul Salas, also doesn’t mind that that her character is a little more mature for her age.
“Actually si Paul po 'yung nagsabi sa akin na mag-audition ako para sa role so supportive siya,” she said.
Imperial said an opportunity like this doesn’t come very often. That’s why she is willing to do everything to prove herself as an actress.
“Dati po hindi naman po ako bida. Dati nga masaya na ako kapag nakakapagsalita ako sa isang teleserye. Hindi naman po lahat nabibigyan ng chance na mabigyan ng ganitong klaseng break. Sobrang thankful ako and happy,” she said.
Directed by Theodore Boborol, “Precious Hearts Romances: Araw, Gabi” will start airing on ABS-CBN beginning April 30.

summary: Walang problema para kay Dimples Romana kung hindi man siya ang bida sa kanyang mga project tulad ng "Bagani."
title: Dimples Romana, walang problema kahit hindi bida
story:
Watch more in iWantv or TFC.tv
MANILA -- Walang problema para kay Dimples Romana kung hindi man siya ang bida sa kanyang mga project tulad ng "Bagani."
Sa "Magandang Buhay" nitong Martes, kinuwento ni Dimples nung minsan siyang tinanong ng kanyang anak kung bakit hindi siya nagbibida kahit na magaling itong aktres.
"Noong time na 'yon I remember parang tatatanggap ako ng award for 'The Greatest Love' pero ang award ko best supporting (actress). Tapos tinanong ni Callie, 'Mommy, bakit hindi best actress eh ang galing-galing mo doon?' So ang hirap i-explain sa bata, hindi ba? Ako kasi natanggap ko na within myself na lahat tayo we all have different places sa buhay. At hindi ko puwedeng asamin 'yung hindi para sa akin," ani Dimples.
"So, kahit pa grabe kang magtrabaho, if you feel that this particular position will not be good for you or your family, I also don't want to challenge what the Lord has planned for me. So kung ano ang plano Niya sa akin ay hindi bida, okay lang din 'yon, walang problema 'yon sa akin," dagdag na paliwanag ni Dimples.
Sa ngayon ay masaya si Dimples sa tagumpay ng seryeng "Bagani" kung saan mainit ang pagtanggap ng mga manonood sa karakter niya bilang Gloria na isang babaylan.
"Masarap sa pakiramdam na na-appreciate ng mga ka-Bagani namin. Ang sarap kapag nagti-trending 'uy nagustuhan nila,'" ani Dimples na inaming nanibago siya aa kanyang karakter bilang isang babaylan.

summary: Kris Aquino is set to have to her first shooting day on Wednesday for the Star Cinema movie “I Love You, Hater” also starring Julia Barreto and Joshua Garcia.
title: Kris shares details of Star Cinema film ahead of first shooting day
story:
Kris Aquino at ABS-CBN for her contract signing with Star Cinema on April 20, 2018. Fernando G. Sepe Jr., ABS-CBN News


MANILA -- Kris Aquino is set to start shooting the upcoming Star Cinema movie “I Love You, Hater” also starring Julia Barreto and Joshua Garcia on Wednesday.
But before she takes on the role of Sasha Imperial, Aquino posted a short clip on social media of her bonding moments with her two sons, Joshua and Bimby.
According to Aquino, the video is to remind her that her two boys are her greatest achievements in life.
“For you to give an effective portrayal - you must surrender & embrace the character. It will be a difficult couple of months because there are painful truths in Sasha’s life that run parallel to mine,” she said.
“Baka habang nag shu-shooting, makalimutan ko kung sino si Kris at sino si Sasha, marami kasi sila masyadong pagkakahawig,” she added.
“That’s why I made this video - to remind me that ‘I would never trade the tears, the conversations no one hears, the learning how to walk before we run...’”



 

A post shared by Kris C. Aquino (@krisaquino) on Apr 23, 2018 at 10:44am PDT



She then provided a short overview about the character she will portray.
Aquino said she plays a former broadcast journalist who started her own digital media company that eventually grew into an empire.
Joko (Garcia) and Zoey (Barretto), on the other hand, will compete against each other to become Sasha’s executive assistant.
“Umuuwi sya sa isang mansyon pero kahit akala ng lahat napakasaya ng buhay nya, hindi siya buo dahil wala siyang naging anak at hindi siya nagkaroon ng ‘closure’ sa dating asawa. Si Joko at si Zoey magiging malaking mga instrumento para buuin ang nabasag na puso ni Sasha,” she said.
As the three of them work together, they will discover many things about each other.
Directed by Giselle Andres, “I Love You, Hater” is Aquino’s comeback project with Star Cinema. It is slated to open in cinemas nationwide on June 13.

summary: JM de Guzman assured his fans of his strong resolve to live a substance-free life, especially now that ABS-CBN has given him another chance to show how good of an actor he really is.
title: JM de Guzman continues to attend therapy sessions
story:
A post shared by JM De Guzman (@1migueldeguzman) on Mar 18, 2018 at 1:38am PDT



MANILA – JM de Guzman assured his fans of his strong resolve to stay substance-free, especially now that ABS-CBN has given him another chance at showbiz.
Speaking to reporters on Monday, de Guzman said he continuously seeks help from his support group and attends their monthly meetings.
“Meron po kaming monthly requirement to attend therapy sessions nung mga peers ko sa loob kasama 'yung family namin para tuloy-tuloy 'yung support,” he said.
“Kailangan maging humble enough pa rin ako to seek help always. Kasi recovery is a life-long struggle or fight. Kapag tumigil ako humingi ng tulong or ng support, doon ako puwedeng madapa po ulit.”
De Guzman said he will graduate from the after-care support group in July but he will be joining the graduates' support group immediately thereafter.
Meanwhile, de Guzman thanks his management for never failing to believe in him despite what he’s been through.
“Actually 'yung expectations ko nga po, tinanggal ko na. Nung time na pinayagan ako ng rehab to reintegrate and make amends sa ABS, pumunta po ako dito kasama 'yung counselor ko. Wala po akong in-expect na kahit ano. Nagulat nga po ako na meron pa po silang plano for me. Sobra ko pong na-appreciate,” he said.



 

A post shared by JM De Guzman (@1migueldeguzman) on Apr 18, 2018 at 7:32am PDT



De Guzman is currently busy working on his comeback TV project “Precious Hearts Romances: Araw Gabi.” 
He will play the role of Adrian, whose life is full of darkness. He is the CEO of the Olividar Group of Companies where Tranquila Resort, a vacation spot situated in El Paraiso, is part of. 
Because of a sin he committed 18 years ago, he is considered a beast by his employees and an outcast in his hometown. 
The series will start airing on ABS-CBN on April 30.

summary: After 18 years in a career that has her performing onscreen and on stage, singer-comedienne K Brosas has admitted that, to this day, she does not find herself beautiful.
title: K Brosas: I don't find myself beautiful
story:
After 18 years in a career that has her performing onscreen and on stage, singer-comedienne K Brosas has admitted that, to this day, she does not find herself beautiful.
This was a topic during her interview on "Tonight with Boy Abunda" that aired Monday, ahead of her anniversary concert at the Kia Theatre in Quezon City on April 28.
Boy Abunda's question, as to whether she ever experienced being told she's not beautiful, spurred K Brosas' candid confession.

 
Initially laughing, she said: "Ako, mismo, sarili ko. Hanggang ngayon naman, eh. Hindi po talaga ako confident, eh. Mula noong nagkaroon lang ako ng 'glam team,' saka lang ako nagkaroon ng confidence."
Despite this, K Brosas said she has nonetheless learned to accept compliments. She's trained herself to instead respond with "thank you," instead of self-deprecating quips.
This was put to the test, when Abunda told the "Tawag ng Tanghalan" judge that she is, in fact, beautiful. Here was K Brosas' answer:

story:
A post shared by Anne Curtis (@annecurtissmith) on Apr 23, 2018 at 5:02am PDT



MANILA - After months of preparation, local superstar Anne Curtis finished on Sunday her second major marathon, this time in London, as she carried the name of a United Nations agency dedicated to children's welfare.
The 33-year-old actress, an appointed Celebrity Advocate of UNICEF-Philippines, had on the organization's banner as a cape as she approached the 42-kilometer finish line, according to the U.N. agency.
In her Instagram stories, Curtis can also be seen wearing a blue tank top, with the print, "For the Filipino Youth," for the duration of the marathon.



 

A post shared by Anne Curtis (@annecurtissmith) on Apr 21, 2018 at 10:04pm PDT



"The London Marathon was my hardest race -- the hardest to get into and the hardest for me to finish," Curtis wrote on Instagram. Don't get me wrong, the route is much easier than NYC but I did not expect the unusual London heat."
Curtis finished the New York Marathon in 2016. That, and the London Marathon, are part of the six-city World Marathon Majors, which include marathons in Tokyo, Boston, Berlin, and Chicago. 
A runner who finishes all six marathons is recognized with the Six-Star Finisher title.
While Curtis had been training for the London Marathon for the greater part of the past year, she admitted there was a point she nearly gave up.

























Anne Curtis shares glimpses of her 42-kilometer run in London. @annecurtissmith/Instagram


Anne Curtis shares glimpses of her 42-kilometer run in London. @annecurtissmith/Instagram


Anne Curtis shares glimpses of her 42-kilometer run in London. @annecurtissmith/Instagram


Anne Curtis shares glimpses of her 42-kilometer run in London. @annecurtissmith/Instagram


Anne Curtis shares glimpses of her 42-kilometer run in London. @annecurtissmith/Instagram


Anne Curtis shares glimpses of her 42-kilometer run in London. @annecurtissmith/Instagram


UNICEF-Philippines gives updates on Anne Curtis' fund-raising drive for the agency. @unicefphils/Instagram 


UNICEF-Philippines gives updates on Anne Curtis' fund-raising drive for the agency. @unicefphils/Instagram 


UNICEF-Philippines gives updates on Anne Curtis' fund-raising drive for the agency. @unicefphils/Instagram 


UNICEF-Philippines gives updates on Anne Curtis' fund-raising drive for the agency. @unicefphils/Instagram 



She narrated: "The moment I hit 20km at 12:30 p.m. I had a hard time breathing, felt dehydrated. The sun was beaming intensely and at one point I wanted to give up. (I know. So dramatic.) But I knew I was running this for a cause, running with a mission -- for the Filipino youth. As painful as it was, it helped me power through those 42 kilometers!"
Leading up to the big event in London, Curtis launched a fund-raising campaign for UNICEF-Philippines, urging her supporters to donate what they can to reach the P84,000 goal -- or double the number of kilometers she would run.
As of Monday night, the goal has been surpassed by 336%, with nearly P283,000 raised so far. These funds, according to UNICEF-Philippines, will go to its emergency response program for children in Marawi, which continues to recover from the five-month battle in 2017.



 

A post shared by UNICEF Philippines (@unicefphils) on Mar 4, 2015 at 9:32pm PST



In her post, Curtis also thanked "the Filipino Community here in London that were on the side lines cheering me on."
"You don't know how much it helped me. Thank you. I've read all your posts and I’m so touched by your kind words. Thank you so much!" she said.
Concluding that "mistakes and new learnings were made" in the marathon, Curtis made known her intention to finish the rest of the major runs to complete the World Marathon Majors, and perhaps become someday a Six-Star Finisher.

summary: Nearly four months after Cristine Reyes made public her prayers for her marriage with Ali Khatibi, with whom she has one child, the two are now rumored to have separated -- a topic that came up in a Monday interview with the actress' sister, Ara Mina.
title: Cristine, husband Ali split? Ara Mina speaks up
story:
A post shared by twitter: @cristinereyesss (@mrscristinekhatibi) on Jul 13, 2016 at 6:52am PDT



Nearly four months after Cristine Reyes made public her prayers for her marriage with Ali Khatibi, with whom she has a child, the two are now rumored to have separated -- a topic that came up in a Monday interview with the actress' sister, Ara Mina.



 

A post shared by 💖Ara Mina (@therealaramina) on Mar 31, 2018 at 8:17am PDT



Mina, 38, was among the cast members of the new ABS-CBN drama "Araw Gabi" who were introduced at a press conference, alongside the leads JM de Guzman and Barbie Imperial.
"Nag-post lang ata siya ng pray for me, tapos nag-haka-haka na sila doon," Mina said, when asked if there are truth to rumors that Reyes and Khatibi are no longer together.

Cristine Reyes prays for marriage with Ali Khatibi




 

A post shared by twitter: @cristinereyesss (@mrscristinekhatibi) on Jul 9, 2016 at 4:51am PDT



"Normal lang naman sa mga mag-asawa ang may hindi pagkaka-intindihan. Hindi naman siguro away -- indifferences [sic]," she added.
Reyes and Khatibi have yet to address this new round speculation -- the actress last denied her marriage was on the rocks in late March -- but eagle-eyed followers of the couple on social media noted how the two have not been posting photos of each other lately.



 

A post shared by twitter: @cristinereyesss (@mrscristinekhatibi) on Jun 3, 2016 at 7:43am PDT



Addressing this, Mina explained: "Sobrang busy kasi ngayon ni Cristine sa mga projects -- 'yung Abay Babes, tapos mayroon pa siya na parang action film, ang sabi niya nag-training daw siya, magpapakita siya ng abs, so ayun."
Reyes's most recent post with Khatibi was on February 15.



 

A post shared by twitter: @cristinereyesss (@mrscristinekhatibi) on Feb 14, 2018 at 5:55pm PST






 

A post shared by twitter: @cristinereyesss (@mrscristinekhatibi) on Feb 8, 2018 at 7:58pm PST



In answering questions about the couple, Mina pointed out that she has not directly asked her younger sister as to her status with Khatibi, but said, by her observation, Reyes does not seem to have gone through a rough patch.
"She's okay naman, madalas kami magkasama," she said. "Hindi siya nagsasabi, very strong pa rin siya, at alam naman niya na anytime na she needs me, nandito lang ako."



 

A post shared by twitter: @cristinereyesss (@mrscristinekhatibi) on Mar 21, 2018 at 6:59am PDT

summary: Kim Chiu, whose string of hit horror films has made her an emerging "queen" of the genre, is glad that her encounter with the supernatural is confined to her roles on screen, and never in real life.
title: WATCH: Spooked Kim Chiu retreats from interview
story:
Kim Chiu, whose string of hit horror films has made her an emerging "queen" of the genre, is glad that her encounter with the supernatural is confined to her roles on screen, and never in real life.



 

A post shared by Kimberly Sue Chiu 🌸 (@chinitaprincess) on Apr 21, 2018 at 8:15pm PDT



In an interview on "Gandang Gabi Vice" that aired Sunday, to promote her just-released film "Da One That Ghost Away," the 28-year-old actress said she has yet to experience seeing or feeling an actual "ghost."
Unknown to Chiu, she would came face to face with one, as host and comedian Vice Ganda had prepared a prank for her.
In the middle of the interview, an old lady dressed a ghost spooked Chiu from behind her seat, sending her running off the stage and behind the cameras.
"Matatakutin ako," said Chiu, who took a while before settling back to her seat, beside her co-star Ryan Bang.

Watch more in iWantv or TFC.tv

summary: South Korean actor Jung Hae In is set to fly to Manila this June to meet with Filipino fans, his agency, FNC Entertainment, announced Monday.
title: Korean actor Jung Hae In to meet fans in PH
story:
South Korean actor Jung Hae In is set to fly to Manila this June to meet with Filipino fans, his agency, FNC Entertainment, announced Monday.

2018.06.30 2018 JUNG HAE IN ‘SMILE’ FAN MEETING IN MANILA
>> https://t.co/sU3axeQOtV#정해인 #JungHaeIn #JHI_SMILE pic.twitter.com/Ijy5NKk5BB
— FNC Ent. (@FNC_ENT) April 23, 2018

The event, "2018 Smile Fan Meeting in Manila," will be held on June 30 at the Kia Theatre.
Tickets are priced at P7,800 for MVP Pass, P5,800 for VIP and P3,500 for general admission. They will be available on Ticketnet starting May 26.
Jung is known for his roles in the dramas "While You Were Sleeping" and "Prison Playbook."
He is currently the lead actor in the series "Something in the Rain," alongside actress Son Ye-jin.

summary: Fans were left wondering why Manzano missed his frequent co-host's wedding last Friday.
title: Why Luis Manzano missed Billy-Coleen wedding
story:
Luis Manzano and Billy Crawford on stage during the 2013 finals night of 'Pilipinas Got Talent.' ABS-CBN


A hosting tandem since 2010, Billy Crawford and Luis Manzano are known to be close friends often with humorous exchanges on TV and social media. 
That's why fans were left wondering why Manzano missed his frequent co-host's wedding last Friday.
Crawford got married to actress Coleen Garcia at Balesin Island Club -- an event that gathered many of their friends in showbiz.

LOOK: Billy Crawford, Coleen Garcia tie the knot

Manzano was Crawford's co-host in the game show "Panahon Ko 'To" and several seasons of the ongoing "Pilipinas Got Talent." They were also formerly part of the four-member Kanto Boys, alongside John Lloyd Cruz and Vhong Navarro.

Watch more in iWantv or TFC.tv
On Instagram, Manzano gave a quick explanation to a follower as to why he was absent from the wedding.
"Unfortunately, I had work both days na 'di puwede mausog," he wrote, adding in jest, "Pero nag-send naman ako ng [video] sa kanya na naliligo ako kaya okay naman."
Manzano also celebrated his 37th birthday on April 21, just a day after Crawford's out-of-town wedding.



 

A post shared by Luis Manzano (@luckymanzano) on Apr 21, 2018 at 9:54pm PDT

summary: Liza Soberano came to the defense of Enrique Gil when a netizen criticized him for supposedly not being a gentleman.
title: Liza assures netizen Enrique is a gentleman
story:
A post shared by Enrique Gil (@enriquegil17) on Dec 2, 2017 at 11:48pm PST



MANILA – Liza Soberano came to the defense of Enrique Gil when a netizen criticized him for supposedly not being a gentleman.
The issue stemmed from Gil’s video on Instagram where he can be seen getting off a jet ahead of Soberano. Instead of helping her, Gil proceeded to talking to the camera that seemed to be documenting their trip.



 

A post shared by Enrique Gil (@enriquegil17) on Apr 21, 2018 at 7:49pm PDT



This irked a netizen and wrote: “Kahit may paa, a gentleman will always help a lady. If he forgets that then he is not a gentleman. It’s a habit na hindi dapat kalimutan. Parang nag mamano sa mga matanda if a person is magalang. That’s my opinion.”
However, Soberano was quick to address the netizen’s concern.
“Do not worry I personally asked Quen to not make me ‘alalay’ when going down the jet for the video. Quen is a gentleman, I will always be the first one to testify for him,” she said.
She also reminded the netizen that she is a “strong lady” who can handle herself.
Despite the comment, Gil did not seem to be affected by the criticism as he only wrote “Haha” in the comments section of his post.
Gil and Soberano are two of the lead stars of the ABS-CBN series “Bagani.”

summary: Amid a revived row between Kris Aquino and her ex-husband James Yap, the basketball player's current partner, Michela Cazzola, has also become the target of malicious comments on social media.
title: James Yap's name being destroyed? Michela, his partner, answers with class
story:
Former couple James Yap and Kris Aquino shake hands as they agree on the visitation rights to their son, Bimby, in this 2014 file photo. ABS-CBN


Amid a revived row between Kris Aquino and her ex-husband James Yap, the basketball star's current partner, Michela Cazzola, has also become the target of malicious comments on social media.



 

A post shared by Mic (@michelacazzola) on Apr 8, 2018 at 5:36am PDT



The Italian national, who is expecting her second child with Yap, responded to one such comment over the weekend, but notably with class and positivity, as observed by her other followers on Instagram.



 

A post shared by James Yap (@jamesyap18) on Feb 12, 2018 at 1:58am PST



The exchange between Cazzola and the follower happened in the comments thread of her post showing her with Yap, as well as their first child together, one-year-old Michael James.



 

A post shared by Mic (@michelacazzola) on Apr 22, 2018 at 12:04am PDT



The follower brought up Aquino's allegation that Yap has stopped providing child support for their son, 11-year-old Bimby, who is in the actress' custody following the annulment of their marriage in February 2012.

Sick of 'half-truths and hypocrisy,' Kris Aquino lashes out at James Yap




 

A post shared by Kris C. Aquino (@krisaquino) on Mar 13, 2018 at 10:58pm PDT






 

A post shared by James Yap (@jamesyap18) on Apr 19, 2018 at 3:03am PDT



Addressing Cazzola, the comment read: "Michela we know you're a decent classy and kind lady why don't you tell James to provide for Bimby's needs, it's in the law."
She answered: "I mind my business and so should you, don't you think that would be the most appropriate thing to do?"



 

A post shared by James Yap (@jamesyap18) on Mar 28, 2018 at 3:02am PDT



Pointing out that Cazzola has a family with Yap, the follower then told her that it was the PBA star's "dignity" that's been put to question, in the face of Aquino's latest tirades against him.
In a few words, Cazzola responded: "It's the perception you created in your mind, it's not necessarily the reality."



 

A post shared by Mic (@michelacazzola) on Aug 8, 2017 at 4:14am PDT



Claiming that Yap's "name is being destroyed right now," the follower thanked Cazzola for answering her questions. The comment added that Cazzola's response should also be reported, in light of Aquino's rant against Yap.









Screenshots of Michela Cazzola's exchange with a follower amid a revived feud between her partner, James Yap, and his ex-wife Kris Aquino. @michelacazzola/Instagram


Screenshots of Michela Cazzola's exchange with a follower amid a revived feud between her partner, James Yap, and his ex-wife Kris Aquino. @michelacazzola/Instagram


Screenshots of Michela Cazzola's exchange with a follower amid a revived feud between her partner, James Yap, and his ex-wife Kris Aquino. @michelacazzola/Instagram


Screenshots of Michela Cazzola's exchange with a follower amid a revived feud between her partner, James Yap, and his ex-wife Kris Aquino. @michelacazzola/Instagram



To this, Cazzola replied: "Actually nothing newsworthy from me, am just saying that reality is complex in general, and I don't like to judge people. Who are we to judge?"



 

A post shared by James Yap (@jamesyap18) on Feb 5, 2018 at 1:52am PST



Yap and Aquino's relationship and subsequent feud have made headlines time and again since they got married in 2005, from their secret wedding, separation, to court battles involving their annulment and visitation rights to Bimby.

Watch more in iWantv or TFC.tv

James Yap pens open letter to son Bimby

This most recent episode was spurred by Yap's open letter greeting Bimby on his birthday, which Aquino apparently saw as a swipe at her, as the Rain or Shine player noted he hasn't seen his son in a long time.

summary: The scheduled fan meeting of South Korean musician-actor Kang Min Hyuk in Manila has been cancelled.
title: CNBLUE's Kang Min Hyuk's Manila fan meeting cancelled
story:
MANILA - The scheduled fan meeting of South Korean musician-actor Kang Min Hyuk in Manila has been cancelled.
In a statement posted on Facebook, Kang's agency, FNC Entertainment, said the fan meeting has been cancelled due to "unforseen local circumstances."
"Both FNC ENTERTAINMENT and the local promoter have tried their best to reschedule the event but unfortunately, have not been able to find a new date," the agency wrote.
FNC also apologized to Kang's fans for the cancellation.
"We deeply apologize to all fans who have been waiting for this event and for any inconvenience this cancellation may have caused," FNC added.
Kang's fan meet, "2018 Romantic Sailing in Manila," was supposed to be held on May 12 at the ABS-CBN Ayala Vertis North Tent.
Kang visited Manila last December with his band, South Korean pop rock group CNBLUE, where he plays the drums.

CNBLUE vocalist tells PH fans: 'I am your lodi'

Kang has also ventured into acting, starring in several dramas such as "The Heirs" and "Heartstrings."

title: 'Suklay Diva' Katrina Velarde, bibida sa Music Hall

A post shared by Katrina Velarde (@katrinavelarde24) on Apr 21, 2018 at 4:30am PDT



MANILA -- Magtatanghal sa Music Hall ang mang-aawit na si Katrina Velarde na kilala rin bilang "Suklay Diva" dahil sa pag-gamit niya ng suklay bilang mikropono.
Unang nakilala si Katrina bilang isa sa miyembro ng grupong AKA Jam at sa kanyang videos online.
Sa kanyang concert na "Pop Variety Night" sa Abril 25, matutunghayan ang galing ni Katrina hindi lang sa pagbirit kung hindi sa pag-awit ng ballads, OPM hits, at iba pang mga sikat na awitin.
Sa ngayon ay may bagong dalawang awitin si Katrina, ang “Lason Mong Halik” at “Taksil.” 
Bisitahin ang Patrol.PH para sa iba pang mga balita.

summary: Francis Concepcion, Mackie Empuerto and Kiefer Sanchez of the group TNT Boys are making waves internationally after the trio performed in the United Kingdom edition of "Little Big Shots."
title: WATCH: 'Tawag ng Tanghalan' kids wow 'Little Big Shots UK'
story:
MANILA -- Francis Concepcion, Mackie Empuerto and Kiefer Sanchez of the group TNT Boys are making waves internationally after the trio performed in the United Kingdom edition of "Little Big Shots."
A video clip of their performance was uploaded on the Facebook page of "Little Big Shots UK" with the caption: "GOOSEBUMPS - this will blow you away!"
The three boys, who were finalists of "Tawag ng Tanghalan Kids," gained prominence after their impromptu performance of Beyonce's "Listen" on "Gandang Gabi Vice" went viral.
They will soon join the latest season of ABS-CBN's "Your Face Sounds Familiar."

summary: ABS-CBN News’ MJ Felipe asked celebrity choreographer Georcelle Dapat-Sy of the G-Force whether she thinks Guidicelli and Geronimo are the next celebrity pair to exchange vows.
title: Teacher Georcelle on Sarah, Matteo: 'They are very happy'
story:
A post shared by Sarah Geronimo Fan (@isgfan) on Apr 4, 2018 at 7:51pm PDT



Matteo Guidicelli has been asked a couple times when he intends to propose to his girlfriend, singer Sarah Geronimo.
But it’s not only the “Bagani” actor who gets to be asked this question in interviews. 
On Saturday, ABS-CBN News’ MJ Felipe asked celebrity choreographer Georcelle Dapat-Sy of the G-Force whether she thinks Guidicelli and Geronimo are the next celebrity pair to exchange vows.
However, Dapat-Sy, who is known to be one of Geronimo’s closest friends, decided to keep mum about the matter.
“Naku wala akong masasabi. It has to come from Sarah. It has to come from Matteo. Of course as you know, Sarah’s life is very private,” she told Felipe during his DZMM program.
Dapat-Sy, nonetheless, shared that Guidicelli and Geronimo “are okay” and are “very happy” together.
“Nakikita ko naman kapag magkasama sila, iba 'yung mga ngiti,” she said.
When asked if she’s in favor of Guidicelli as Geronimo’s boyfriend, Dapat-Sy said: “Alam mo kahit sino pa ang lalaking makapiling ni Sarah, ang importante napapasaya siya, boto ako. Ang importante masaya si Sarah. At nakikita ko kay Matteo, masaya siya.”
Guidicelli and Geronimo are one of the most low profile celebrity couples. Although they decide not work together, they have been supportive of each other’s projects.

summary: Inamin ni Mccoy de Leon na totoong nagkaroon sila ng hindi pagkakaunawaan ng love team partner nito na si Elisse Joson.
title: Mccoy at Elisse, tapos na ba ang tambalan?
story:
Watch more in iWantv or TFC.tv
MANILA -- Inamin ni Mccoy de Leon na totoong nagkaroon sila ng hindi pagkakaunawaan ng love team partner nito na si Elisse Joson pero naayos din nila ito. 
Sa "Magandang Buhay" nitong Lunes, naging bukas si Mccoy at Elisse tungkol sa kanilang pagsasama bilang love team.
"May mga pinagdadaanan po pero pinanghahawakan naman ang mga pamilya namin at ang mga naniniwala sa amin. 'Yun talaga ang pinagkukunan namin ng lakas ng loob, maging masaya," pag-amin ng aktor.
Nang matanong kung kumusta na ang pakikitungo nila sa isa't isa matapos ang kanilang pinagdaanan, sinabi ni Elisse na mas natutunan nila ang maging bukas sa isa't isa.
"After nung hindi pagkakaunawaan eh tapos na po 'yon, ngayon ay okay na po kami. Kasi natutunan nga po namin na mag-usap dahil doon, magkaintindihan," ani Elisse.
"Kasi dati to avoid misunderstanding parang kini-keep na lang sa sarili namin which leads to more ano. Dati 'yon. So ngayon (nag-uusap na)," dagdag ng aktres.
Ayon kay Mccoy napag-usapan din nila ni Elisse kung hanggang saan aabot ang samahan nila sakaling hindi na sila maging love team.
"Isa sa napag-usapan namin what if kung hindi kami love team, ano ang samahan namin. Doon malalaman, doon mate-test kung hanggang saan ang samahan namin. Tulad ng sinabi niyo bata pa po kami. Ngayon magiging masaya dahil sa blessings talaga hindi kami tumitigil. Siyempre kay God, alangan naming tanggihan namin," ani Mccoy.
Pero para sa kanilang mga tagahanga, iginiit ni Mccoy na tuloy-tuloy pa rin ang tambalan nila ni Elisse.
"Kaya nga kami nandito, magkasama pa kami at siyempre sabi nga po namin, kami ring dalawa ang mag-aayos kung anuman ang puwedeng ayusin. Good news naman maganda naman po ang nangyari ngayon. Masaya kaming dalawa," ani Mccoy.
"I think after ng hindi pagkakaintindihan ngayon po ay happy kami," dagdag naman ni Elisse.
Bisitahin ang Patrol.PH para sa iba pang mga balita.
